reasoning: PVCs are among the most common cardiac arrhythmias with incidence ~85 per 100k. Subtype of broader arrhythmia category. Data from cardiac epidemiology studies; moderate confidence due to variable definitions and detection rates.
source: Rademakers FE et al. (2008). Epidemiology of atrial fibrillation and flutter. Eur Heart J. 29(18):2237-2245
